last_episode_to_air.name: The Future Reached
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mira helps Kyōma put the pieces of his memories back together as they all fight to bring down Seameyer together.

name: Dimension W
overview:
Humanity has found a way to achieve infinite energy by using coils to draw it from the fourth plane: dimension "W". With the production of coils having been monopolized by the New Tesla energy company, freelance collectors are hired to find and remove any illegal, unofficial coils.

This is the story of collector Kyōma, who also happens to have a huge hatred towards coils. During one of his missions he stumbles upon a female android that perceives herself as being human, leading the two to enter an unlikely partnership.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the year 2071, the world’s energy problems seem solved by a network of cross-dimensional electric-field inductors- “coils” -that extract energy from a seemingly infinite source. That source is the W dimension, a fourth plane that exists beyond the X, Y, and Z dimensions.

episodes.name: Collector
episodes.overview: Kyōma Mabuchi, a Collector, runs into some trouble on a job and ends up bringing back an android girl named Mira.

episodes.name: Loser
episodes.overview: Kyōma and his new partner, Mira, are after the art thief Loser's illegal coils, but what is Loser really after?

episodes.name: Chase the Numbers
episodes.overview: Mira finally settles into life at the gasoline stand, but will New Tesla find out her secret after an incident with some neighborhood kids?

episodes.name: The Mystery Hidden in Lake Yasogami
episodes.overview: Kyōma and Mira end up at a village with a dark past after Albert asks them to investigate the mysterious death of novelist Shijuro Sakaki.

episodes.name: The Possibilities of the Dead
episodes.overview: Mira is trapped in the past as Kyōma and the others fight against the ghosts in the fog attacking the hotel.

episodes.name: The Wind of Africa
episodes.overview: Prince Salva-Enna-Tibesti, CEO of Islero and COO of Central 60, visits Central 47 with his younger brother, Lwai, who loves Japan.

episodes.name: The Voice Calling from the Past
episodes.overview: Kyōma recalls his past as he gets ready to join the other Collectors on Easter Island.

episodes.name: The Island That Fell into Nothingness
episodes.overview: Kyōma and the other Collectors are on Easter Island in a race to collect the special coil that Prince Salva is after.

episodes.name: The Key to Adrastea
episodes.overview: Kyōma and Salva enter their memories as they and Loser remember their pasts and put more pieces of the puzzle together.

episodes.name: Resurrected Nightmare
episodes.overview: Kyōma starts to connect the dots as he fights with an old comrade controlled by K.K., and the truth is revealed about Lwai.

episodes.name: The Lost Genesis
episodes.overview: Loser shows the others his memories, and Kyōma starts to remember more of his past as they search for the lost coil, Genesis.

episodes.name: The Future Reached
episodes.overview: Mira helps Kyōma put the pieces of his memories back together as they all fight to bring down Seameyer together.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In the year 2071, the world’s energy problems seem solved by a network of cross-dimensional electric-field inductors- “coils” -that extract energy from a seemingly infinite source. That source is the W dimension, a fourth plane that exists beyond the X, Y, and Z dimensions.
